scriptItem.scriptCode: n = kwargs["node"] nname = n.name() npath = n.path() ppos = n.parent().position() renName = nname.replace("TO_REN__","RENDER__") rengeo = hou.node('/obj').createNode('geo',renName) rengeo.setColor(hou.Color(.4,.2,.6)) rengeo.setPosition(ppos + hou.Vector2(0,-1)) rengeo.parm('picking').set(0) objmer_node = rengeo.createNode('object_merge') objmer_node.parm('xformtype').set(1) objmer_node.parm('objpath1').set(npath)
